properties.name: jack.oauth2.auth-server-uri
properties.description: 授权服务的地址，例如：http://ip:port/contextPath，注意：后面不不不要加斜杠/.

properties.name: jack.oauth2.resource-server-uri
properties.description: 资源服务的地址，例如：http://ip:port/contextPath，注意：后面不不不要加斜杠/.

properties.name: jack.oauth2.client-id
properties.description: 在授权服务器上注册的OAuth client的id（应用名称）.

properties.name: jack.oauth2.client-secret
properties.description: 在授权服务器上注册的OAuth client的秘钥.

properties.name: jack.oauth2.client-ip
properties.description: 当前应用部署的服务器ip，需要和授权服务器上注册的OAuth client回调地址中的ip保持一致.
